panels.description: Total number of docs in the database
panels.title: Doc Count [$db_name]

panels.description: Total number of doc conflicts which need to be resolved manually.
panels.title: Total Doc Conflicts

panels.description: The number of deleted docs in the DB.
panels.title: Deleted Docs

panels.description: Number of CouchDB changes that have not yet been processed by Couch2pg
panels.title: Couch2pg Backlog

panels.description: The fragmentation of the db, lower is better, “1” is no fragmentation.
panels.title: Fragmentation

panels.description: The current server date and time, useful for ensuring the server time is correct.
panels.title: Current Server Time

panels.description: Number of changes yet to be processed by Sentinel.
panels.title: Sentinel Backlog

panels.description: Number of users that exceeded the replication limit of documents.
panels.title: Users Over Replication Limit

panels.description: Number of feedback docs created usually indicative of client side errors.
panels.title: Client Feedback/Errors

panels.description: Number of changes yet to be processed by Outbound Push.
panels.title: Outbound Push Backlog

panels.description: Number of users that have connected to the api in the past month.
panels.title: Monthly Active Users
